name: 余琬琴
objective:
本課程介紹動、植物和細菌的細胞結構，以及各式生物分子的構造與功能，如蛋白質、醣類、DNA、RNA 和脂質。

This course introduces the structures of animal, plant and bacterial cells and the basic structures and functions of various biological molecules, such as proteins, carbohydrates, DNA, RNA, and lipids.
